events.message: The customer reported their vehicle was involved in a collision on the highway yesterday evening.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the details of the car collision provided by the claimant.
An agent was assigned to the case to manage communications and coordinate the next steps for the auto accident claim.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and the customer received confirmation along with initial instructions for document submissions.
Request sent to the claimant for the accident report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimate to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident report and mechanic’s damage assessment within the expected timeframe.
Investigation began to verify the details of the collision and assess the extent of the damages to the vehicle.
The investigation confirmed the circumstances of the accident, with no dispute on liability or damage evaluation.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and related expenses as per policy coverage limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clear, timely communication throughout the process.
Claim was approved officially, authorizing payment to cover the repair costs as agreed in the settlement.
Payment was issued to the customer’s preferred account to cover the repair expenses following claim approval.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and satisfaction of the customer.
The claim documents and case files were archived in the system for future reference in compliance with company policies.
